author: cms-met
body:
This fix allows the MET tool to run in 76X after the changes of name made in 
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/12890
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/12950

Changes in production chain : none
Packages changed : 
PhysicsTools/PatUtils
PhysicsTools/PatAlgos (for the test config file)

This PR does NOT correct the bugs found in 74X and addressed in 80X with #13115 as the backport of it would require a change of dataformat and production chain. The plan is to backport 80X to 76X in a private branch that users can get with a merge-topic if needed.
title: Fix JEC updater for MET correction in 76X
